Articles.Content: I went to kerbol(Sun) and decided to take a plunge at it because I am pure evil what i realized was that there were a few black spots but there was nothing interesting on Kerbol it was just a big round sphere my suggestion is to make kerbol more sun like with solar arches and liquid like surface making kerbol a fun place to kill your kerbals at.
That's a bit kruel. But I do like the idea. It having a bubbly/Liguidy surface with solar flares and such. That would make kerbol a much more hostile place.
